## Commit Convention

<!-- Ensure your commits follow conventional commits format -->

Commits should follow this format:
- `feat:` for new features (will appear in changelog under ğŸš€ Features)
- `fix:` for bug fixes (will appear in changelog under ğŸ› Bug Fixes)
- `docs:` for documentation (will appear in changelog under ğŸ“š Documentation)
- `chore:`, `refactor:`, `test:` for maintenance (will appear under ğŸ”§ Maintenance)

**Example:** `feat: add Cardano (ADA) blockchain support`
